title: Airliner with 62 aboard feared to have crashed after takeoff
description: Indonesia's Sriwijaya Air lost contact with a plane that left Jakarta on Saturday, according to Indonesia's Head Of National Transportation Safety Committee, Suryanto Cahyono.

title: Louie Barry: 17-year-old lights up English football with goal -- and smile -- in debut
description: Footballers don't usually smile after losing a game 4-1, but all is forgiven in the case of teenager Louie Barry.

title: Three arrested after endangered Ganges river dolphin beaten to death in India
description: Police in India's northern Uttar Pradesh state have arrested three people allegedly involved in the killing of the endangered Ganges river dolphin after a video of the grim incident went viral on social media, according to local police.

title: One week into 2021 and we're already looking forward to 2022
description: After a nightmarish 2020 of relentless bad news, this year seemed like a fresh start.

title: Disturbing video shows officer crushed against door by mob storming the Capitol
description: A horrifying video from Wednesday's Capitol riots showed an officer crushed between waves of a pro-Trump mob and officers defending the building.

title: Twitter takes Trump's special power away as his isolation grows
description: It took President Donald Trump years and tens of thousands of tweets to build up 88.7 million followers on Twitter. It took a single moment Friday to lose them forever.

title: Huge sinkhole opens up outside Italian hospital
description: A huge sinkhole, about 22,000 square feet across and 66 feet deep, swallowed several cars and forced the evacuation of a Covid ward after opening up in the parking lot of a hospital in southern Italy on Friday.

title: Here's when experts say we'll be traveling again
description: There's hope: Summer vacations abroad may happen in a big way this year.

title: More states report climbing Covid-19 numbers as CDC chief warns US Capitol riot was a likely 'surge event'
description: On the heels of the country's deadliest week since the Covid-19 pandemic's start, state officials are warning of more alarming patterns following the holiday season.

title: Kim Jong Un says North Korea is developing tactical nukes, new warheads and a nuclear-powered submarine
description: North Korean leader Kim Jong Un said his country is developing new weaponry including a nuclear-powered submarine, tactical nuclear weapons and advanced warheads designed to penetrate missile defense systems.

title: Rioter who put his feet up on Nancy Pelosi's desk arrested
description: The man photographed sitting at House Speaker Nancy Pelosi's desk during Wednesday's riots in the US Capitol has been arrested and charged with three federal counts, including theft of public property, federal officials said Friday.

title: Officer crushed in door by rioters at US Capitol
description: CNN's Don Lemon reacts to disturbing footage of an officer being crushed in a door during the riots at the US Capitol.

title: Anderson Cooper: To Trump these are 'loser' words
description: CNN's Anderson Cooper reacts to reports that President Donald Trump was "delighted" by his supporters behavior at the Capitol riot and wonders how Trump will be held accountable.

title: Twitter bans President Trump permanently
description:
• Analysis: Twitter takes Trump's special power away as his isolation grows
• Analysis: Neither Trump nor the movement he leads is going anywhere

title: Right-wing social media app Parler has been removed from the Google Play store
description: Parler, the alternative social media platform popular with conservatives, has been banned from the Google Play Store, Google told CNN Business Friday evening.

title: DC police made far more arrests at the height of Black Lives Matter protests than during the Capitol clash
description: Black Lives Matter protesters in Washington, DC, last summer found themselves facing a massive show of force: military helicopters hovering over the city, National Guard troops patrolling the streets and tear gas filling the air.

title: Spectacular city carved from snow and ice rises in China
description: The 37th annual Harbin Snow and Ice Festival is continuing on as planned, although with modifications due to new outbreaks of coronavirus nearby.

title: Officials claim Oregon legislator let protesters into state Capitol during closed session
description: A Republican state legislator may have let protesters into the Oregon Capitol last month during a closed session, according to state police and officials, resulting in a showdown that left two people arrested.

title: Trump faces potential fast-track impeachment
description: House Democrats, furious at President Donald Trump, are quickly building momentum toward impeaching the President next week.

title: What we know about Covid-19 vaccines in Asia Pacific
description: One year after the Covid-19 outbreak began, countries around the world are racing to secure and distribute vaccines to their citizens.

title: As riot raged at Capitol, Trump tried to call senators to overturn election
description: President Donald Trump and his attorney Rudy Giuliani both mistakenly made calls to Republican Sen. Mike Lee as deadly riots were unfolding at the US Capitol earlier this week, a spokesman for the senator confirmed to CNN -- calls that were intended for another GOP senator the White House was frantically trying to convince to delay the counting of Electoral College votes.

title: Extremists intensify calls for violence ahead of Inauguration Day
description: "Trump or war. Today. That simple."
